overview.heading: What is Boundary?
overview.body: Securely access any system from anywhere based on user identity.

get_started.heading: Getting Started
get_started.body: Quick start with a new identity-based access management tool.

cards.title: Identity-based Access
cards.description: Enable privileged sessions for users and applications based on user identity and role.

cards.title: Service Discovery
cards.description: Service discovery focuses on automating the process of onboarding new or changed infrastructure resources to Boundary as hosts.

cards.title: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
cards.description: Define policies and manage Boundary with Terraform provider that supports the full breadth of Boundary configurations.

cards.title: Session Visibility and Audit Logs
cards.description: Visibility into session metrics, events, logs, and traces with the ability to export data to business intelligence and event monitoring tools.
